items.name: Himachali Chana Madra
items.description: A popular vegetarian dish from Himachal Pradesh. It's made with chickpeas (chana) cooked in a yogurt based gravy with aromatic spices like cardamom, cinnamon and cumin.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Himachali Anardana Murg
items.description: A flavourful chicken preparation from Himachal Pradesh. Chicken is cooked in aromatic spices and dried pomegranate seeds that adds a unique tart and tangy flavour and a pinkish-reddish colour to the dish.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha/rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Honey Chilli Potato
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish made by frying crispy potatoes and tossing them in a sweet and spicy sauce. The dish is a perfect combination of sweet, savory, and spicy flavors.

items.name: Neer Dosa
items.description: A popular South Indian crepe made with rice flour and coconut milk. The dish is known for its delicate texture and subtle flavor, and is served with spicy chutney and sambar. (3 dosas)

items.name: Paneer Makhni
items.description: Creamy buttery gravy made with onion, tomato, cashew, garlic & ginger with soft cottage cheese cubes
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Kerala Mackerel Curry
items.description: A popular fish curry from the South Indian state of Kerala, made with spicy coconut-based gravy and mackerel fish. The dish is known for its rich and creamy texture and is made with a blend of aromatic spices such as turmeric, coriander, and cumin.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha/rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Butter Garlic Mushrooms
items.description: A delicious and simple vegetarian dish made with sautéed mushrooms in a rich garlic and butter sauce.

items.name: Dal Tadka & Rice
items.description: A popular North Indian dish known for its comforting and satisfying flavor. Yellow lentils are cooked and tempered with spices and aromatic herbs and served with rice.

items.name: Rajasthani Gobi Rajwadi
items.description: A spicy and flavorful dish made with cauliflower cooked in a rich tomato and onion gravy. The dish is seasoned with a blend of aromatic spices and finished off with a garnish of fresh coriander.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Maharashtrian Kolambi Masala
items.description: A flavorful Maharashtrian shrimp curry, made with a blend of aromatic spices and coconut. The dish is known for its spicy and tangy flavor and is made with fresh shrimp cooked in a thick gravy of onions, tomatoes, and coconut.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha/rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Street Style Moonglet
items.description: A popular Indian street food made with moong dal (split green gram) and vegetables cooked in a savory pancake-style dish. The moonglet is flavored with aromatic spices and can be customized with various toppings such as cheese, tomato, and onion.

items.name: Sambar Rice
items.description: A comfort meal from the south of India. Lentils and veggies cooked together with tamarind, and freshly made sambar masala tempered with mustard seeds and curry leaves. Served with rice + papad

items.name: Veg Schezwan Noodles
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish loaded with veggies and spices and lots of flavour
items.extra: make it a meal with veg manchurian gravy

items.name: Chicken Schezwan Noodles
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish loaded with veggies, chicken, spices lots flavour.
items.extra: make it a meal with a side of chicken manchurian gravy.

items.name: Pahadi Paneer Tikka
items.description: A popular North Indian dish made with marinated paneer (cottage cheese) and grilled on skewers

items.name: Palak Lasuni Kichidi
items.description: Lasuni Palak Kichidi is a flavorful South Indian dish made with rice, lentils, spinach, and garlic. The dish is cooked with aromatic spices and finished off with a tempering of garlic and cumin seeds for added flavor.

items.name: Vegetable Korma
items.description: Flavourful Indian dish with a mix of vegetables like carrots, potatoes, green beans, and peas cooked in a creamy, spiced sauce made with yogurt, coconut milk, and various aromatic spices such as cumin, coriander, turmeric, and garam masala.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Chicken Korma
items.description: Chicken cooked with caramalised onions, nuts, yogurt, ginger, garlic and other spices
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad

items.name: Chicken Puff
items.description: A savory mixture of spiced chicken and vegetables and baked in a pastry shell until golden brown and crispy. (2 pieces)

items.name: Vangi Bhat
items.description: A traditional Maharashtrian dish made by cooking rice with eggplants and a blend of spices. A flavorful and filling dish.

items.name: Bhindi Masala
items.description: A popular north Indian dish made with okra cooked in a tomato based sauce with a blend of aromatic spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Galouti Kurchan
items.description: A popular North Indian dish that combines two different dishes - Galouti Kebab and Kurchan. Galouti Kebab is a tender and flavorful minced meat kebab that originated in the Awadh region of India, while Kurchan is a spicy and tangy curry made with onions, tomatoes, and a blend of aromatic spices.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Beetroot Tikki
items.description: Mashed beetroot and potatoes that are flavored with a blend of aromatic spices and then shallow fried until crispy on the outside. (4 pieces)

items.name: Pudina Pulao
items.description: A fragrant and flavorful rice dish from North India. It is made with long-grain basmati rice cooked with a blend of aromatic spices and fresh mint leaves to create a refreshing and delicious flavor.

items.name: Veg Triple Schezwan Rice
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish that consists of rice stir-fried with a medley of different vegetables (such as carrots, beans, and bell peppers) and spicy Schezwan sauce.
items.extra: make it a meal with a portion of veg manchurian gravy

items.name: Chicken Triple Schezwan Rice
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese dish that features stir-fried rice, chunks of tender chicken, and a medley of different vegetables (such as carrots, beans, and bell peppers) and spicy Schezwan sauce.
items.extra: make it a meal with a portion of chicken manchurian gravy

items.name: Moong Appams
items.description: A South Indian dish made from moong dal, rice and spices. The batter is fermented and then cooked on a special pan to make small, fluffy pancakes. Served with side of coconut chutney.

items.name: Mushroom Fried Rice
items.description: A popular Indo-Chinese style fried rice dish made with cooked rice, sautéed mushrooms, vegetables and a blend of sauces and seasonings.

items.name: Paneer Ghee Roast
items.description: A popular vegetarian dish from the coastal region of Karnataka in South India. Cubed pieces of paneer are marinated in a spice mixture and then pan-fried until it is golden brown and then simmered in a flavorful gravy made with onion, tomato, ginger, garlic, and a blend of aromatic spices such as cumin, coriander, turmeric and garam masala.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Donne Biryani
items.description: Made with fragrant long-grain basmati rice, tender pieces of chicken and a blend of spices including cumin, coriander, cardamom, cinnamon, and bay leaves. The dish is garnished with fried onions, fresh coriander leaves, and a squeeze of lemon juice. Donne Biryani is known for its distinctive and complex flavors

items.name: Khandvi
items.description: A batter made of gram flour, yogurt and spices spread into thin layers, rolled into small spiral and steamed.

items.name: Kadhi Chawal
items.description: Kadhi is a yogurt based gravy typically made with a mixture of yogurt, besan (gram flour), and spices. Served with chawal (rice).
